tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_preferences (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  purchase_history TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    city VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    price NUMERIC(10,2),
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    target_audience VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT, customer_name VARCHAR, email_address VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE purchases (purchase_id INT, customer_id INT, purchase_date DATE, purchase_amount DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE products (product_id INT, product_name VARCHAR, product_category VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE preferences (customer_id INT, product_id INT, preference_score INT)
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT, campaign_name VARCHAR, target_product_id INT)
